medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient experienced abdominal pain for 1 day, which began last night in the lower quadrants. She has had associated nausea but denies fevers and chills. This is her first such episode.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Diverticulosis, chronic pain management for a fall with head strike, fibromyalgia, cervical radiculitis, cough-variant asthma.
